comment: Absolutely fresh tomatoes! Arrived in perfect condition. Will definitely order again.
Good quality organic produce. Slightly smaller than expected but taste is great.
Best tomatoes I've had in a long time. Truly organic and tasty!
Decent product. Delivery was a bit late but the tomatoes were fresh.
Nice organic tomatoes. Good for cooking curries and salads.
Excellent quality! The farmer is very responsive and packaging was great.
Very fresh and tasty. Price is reasonable for organic produce.
A few tomatoes were overripe on arrival. Hope quality is more consistent next time.
Perfectly ripe, no chemicals. My family loved it. Ordering again!
Good organic tomatoes. Would love more variety from this farmer.
Super fresh, arrived quickly. Best organic tomatoes on this platform!
Average experience. Tomatoes were okay but expected more for the price.
